required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on April 10, 2017
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: LHA510 Proof-of-Concept Study as a Maintenance Therapy for Patients With Wet Age-Related Macular Degeneration
clinical_study.official_title: A Randomized, Double-Masked, Vehicle-Controlled Proof-Of-Concept Study for Topically Delivered LHA510 as a Maintenance Therapy in Patients With Wet Age-Related Macular Degeneration (AMD)

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the efficacy of 84 successive days of topically administered LHA510 compared to vehicle in reducing the number of patients requiring intravitreal (IVT) anti-vascular endothelial growth factor (VEGF) therapy (Lucentis®) for recurrence of active choroidal neovascularization (CNV).

detailed_description.textblock: The standard of care for recurrence of active CNV is an IVT injection of an anti-VEGF agent. In this study, recurrence of CNV will be treated exclusively with IVT Lucentis®. On Day -1, patients will receive an IVT Lucentis® injection, and then will be randomized to receive either topical LHA510 ophthalmic suspension or vehicle in a 1:1 ratio.

primary_outcome.measure: Number of patients requiring Lucentis® retreatment before or at Day 84

secondary_outcome.measure: Time to first injection of Lucentis® required up to Day 84
Number of Lucentis® injections required up to Day 84
Change from Randomization Visit (Day -1) in central subfield thickness total (CSFTtot) at each visit
Change from Randomization Visit (Day -1) in Best Corrected Visual Acuity (BCVA) at each visit
Change from Randomization Visit (Day -1) in central subfield thickness, neuro retina (CSFTnr) at each visit
Change from Randomization Visit (Day -1) in lesion thickness at each visit
Change from Randomization Visit (Day -1) in subretinal fluid - foveal involvement (SRFfi) thickness at each visit
Change from Randomization Visit (Day -1) in pigment epithelial detachment - foveal involvement (PEDfi) thickness at each visit
Change from Randomization Visit (Day -1) in total lesion size at each visit
Change from Randomization Visit (Day -1) in CNV size at each visit
The observed maximum plasma (or serum or blood) concentration following drug administration [mass / volume] (Cmax)
secondary_outcome.description: Contingent upon observed serum concentration levels

arm_group.description: LHA510 ophthalmic suspension administered topically in the study eye as specified in the protocol for 84 days, with ranibizumab ophthalmic solution for IVT injection standard of care.
LHA510 vehicle administered topically in the study eye as specified in the protocol for 84 days, with ranibizumab ophthalmic solution for IVT injection standard of care.

intervention.description: Inactive ingredients used as a placebo comparator

overall_official.affiliation: Novartis Institutes for BioMedical Research, Inc.
